# cells

**Instance Property**

An array containing the cells of the matrix.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var cells: [NSCell] { get }
```

## Discussion

The cells in the array are row-ordered; that is, the first row of cells appears first in the array, followed by the second row, and so forth.

## Finding Cells

- **selectedCells**: An array containing all of the matrix’s highlighted cells plus its selected cell.
- **selectedColumn**: The column number of the selected cell.
- **selectedRow**: The row number of the selected cell.
- **cell(atRow:column:)**: Returns the cell at the specified row and column.
- **cell(withTag:)**: Searches the receiver and returns the last cell matching the specified tag.
